---
title: "cache.iscached"
description: "Returns true if the instance is in the instance cache."
---

```lua
cache.iscached(i: Instance): boolean
```
## Example

```lua
local Lighting = game:GetService("Lighting")
print(cache.iscached(Lighting)) -- outputs: true

cache.invalidate(game:GetService("Lighting"))
print(cache.iscached(Lighting)) -- outputs: false
```
